Blueberry_leaf_00005.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and a slightly serrated edge. The leaf has a few small spots or discolorations, primarily on the upper left side. The petiole is thin and green, and it appears to be attached to the stem at a slight angle.

Blueberry_leaf_00002.jpg.text: The leaf is green with a base color that transitions to a lighter shade towards the tip. There are several dark spots or discolorations on the leaf, primarily located towards the center and edges. The leaf has a somewhat oval shape with serrated edges. The texture appears to be slightly rough, and there are no visible damages on the leaf. The petiole is pinkish-red and appears to be thin and smooth.

Blueberry_leaf_00003.jpg.text: The leaf in the image is green with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and a slightly serrated edge. The leaf has a few small spots or discolored areas, primarily on the upper side. The veins are visible, running from the base to the tip of the leaf. The petiole is thin and green, matching the leaf's color.
